Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of a pale-red pottery storage-vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a cream-coloured deposit, the exterior is covered with light-brown slip, now much darkened, and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393756) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393756)
